articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: CEOs had said they'd speak out against Trump if stocks sink 20% - Fortune
articles.description: Elon Musk said Saturday he hopes for a "zero-tariff" system between the US and Europe that would create "a free-trade zone."

articles.author: Alison Durkee
articles.title: New Musk White House Feud? Peter Navarro Claims ‘No Rift’ After Billionaire Attacks Him Over Tariffs - Forbes
articles.description: Musk has stayed mostly silent on Trump’s sweeping tariffs, but called for zero tariffs between the U.S. and Europe on Saturday.
articles.content: Trump trade adviser Peter Navarro denied Sunday hes feuding with billionaire Elon Musk over President Donald Trumps sweeping tariffs, after the billionaire attacked Navarro on X for defending them, a… [+4789 chars]
